name: Movie Name Cleaner
description: Intelligently cleans messy movie titles by removing quality markers, website tags, and release group information while preserving already clean names. Only processes titles that contain detectable messy patterns.
overview: Clean up your movie library by automatically removing unwanted text from movie titles like quality markers (1080p, BluRay, x265), website tags (www.site.com), audio formats (DTS-HD MA), and release group suffixes (-SWTYBLZ). The plugin intelligently detects messy patterns before cleaning, ensuring clean titles remain unchanged.

versions.changelog: Initial release with intelligent pattern detection and safe title cleaning
